summary: BREAKING PROBLEMS CAUSE ME TO BE INVOLVE IN A WRECK  UPON ENTERING AN INTERSECTION I HIT A SMALL BUMP IN THE HIGHWAY AND THE BREAKS LET OFF CAUSING ME TO TURN INTO THE CENTER LANE WHERE I WAS HIT BY A TRUCK.
